org.kitteh.irc.client.library.event.client

Class SSLCertificateAcceptEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kitteh.irc.client.library.event.abstractbase.ClientEventBase
      • org.kitteh.irc.client.library.event.client.SSLCertificateAcceptEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientEvent

    public class SSLCertificateAcceptEvent
extends ClientEventBase
    Fires when connecting to a server via SSL. By default approves any certs. Basically we're just letting you decide on X509TrustManager.checkServerTrusted(java.security.cert.X509Certificate[], java.lang.String). Instead of throwing an exception, just use setDenied(boolean) and one will be thrown for you.
